Question: Both images include a glass of wine near a wine bottle and a bunch of grapes.

Reference Answer: False

Right image URL: https://i.pinimg.com/236x/02/7f/e2/027fe2d45ec1a15d9b016cb297e6646c--wine-photography-photography-photos.jpg

Original program:

```
The provided program is not complete and does not include the necessary steps to evaluate the statement. To determine if both images include a glass of wine near a wine bottle and a bunch of grapes, we need to compare the contents of both images. Here is a revised program that can be used to evaluate the statement:
```
Program:

```
ANSWER0=VQA(image=IMAGE,question="Is 'Both images include a glass of wine near a wine bottle and a bunch of grapes.' true or false?")
FINAL_RESULT=RESULT(var=ANSWER0)
```
Rationale:

<hr><div><b><span style='color: blue;'>ANSWER0</span></b>=<b><span style='color: red;'>VQA</span></b>(<b><span style='color: darkorange;'>image</span></b>=<img style="vertical-align:middle" src="data:image/jpeg;base64,">,&nbsp;<b><span style='color: darkorange;'>question</span></b>='Is 'Both images include a glass of wine near a wine bottle and a bunch of grapes.' true or false?')=<b><span style='color: green;'>false</span></b></div><hr><div><b><span style='color: red;'>RESULT</span></b> -> <b><span style='color: blue;'>ANSWER0</span></b> -> <b><span style='color: green;'>false</span></b></div><hr>

Answer: false
